items.sentence: Let\'s hope that that\'s the last time that happens.
Let\'s hope that\'s the last time that that happens.
She wrote him a long letter, but he didn\'t read it.
She\'s been having trouble with back pain for years.
The horse that won the race is owned by Tom Jackson.
I can\'t get over how different the weather is here.
I saw my neighbor\'s dog running around in the yard.
It would seem that you know something that I don\'t.
Don\'t be so greedy or you\'ll wind up with nothing.
They agreed to look into the causes of the accident.
Tom doesn\'t understand how that could\'ve happened.
Tom would still be alive if he\'d been more careful.
Tom wouldn\'t tell me where he had hidden the money.
Tom applied for the position, but he didn\'t get it.
Tom was drunk and forgot where he\'d parked his car.
Tom\'s apartment is way too big for just one person.
Valentine\'s Day is celebrated all around the world.
Tom is wearing a coat that\'s way too large for him.
Tom isn\'t likely to forget to tell Mary to do that.
I\'m sorry to hear that your father has passed away.
